# load on modules 1 & 2
1 1 0x0000
2 1 0x0100
1 1 0x0200
2 1 0x0300
wait 10
1 1 0x0400
2 1 0x0500
1 1 0x0600
2 1 0x0700
wait 10
# load on modules 1 & 0
1 1 0x0800
0 1 0x0900
1 1 0x0a00
0 1 0x0b00
wait 10
1 1 0x0c00
0 1 0x0d00
1 1 0x0e00
0 1 0x0f00
1 1 0x1000

wait 100
# store on modules 1 & 2
1 2 0x0f00
2 2 0x0e00
1 2 0x0d00
2 2 0x0c00
wait 10
1 2 0x0b00
2 2 0x0a00
1 2 0x0900
2 2 0x0800
wait 10
# store on modules 2 & 0
2 2 0x0700
0 2 0x0600
2 2 0x0500
0 2 0x0400
wait 10
2 2 0x0300
0 2 0x0200
2 2 0x0100
0 2 0x0000
